item.title: Academic: honlap tervező Hugo rendszerre
item.description: És most magyarul is megpróbáljuk. Academic makes it easy to create a beautiful website for free using Markdown. Customize anything on your site with widgets, themes, and language packs. Follow our easy step by step guide to learn how to build your own free website with Academic. Check out the personal demo or the business demo of what you’ll get in less than 10 minutes. View the documentation Ask a question Request a feature or report a bug Updating?
